name: store_sales_numeric
description: Store sales numeric columns - testing decimal/float heavy data
query: select ss_sold_date_sk, ss_item_sk, ss_customer_sk, ss_quantity, ss_wholesale_cost, ss_list_price, ss_sales_price, ss_ext_discount_amt, ss_ext_sales_price, ss_ext_wholesale_cost, ss_ext_list_price, ss_ext_tax, ss_coupon_amt, ss_net_paid, ss_net_paid_inc_tax, ss_net_profit from main.tpcds_sf1_delta.store_sales

name: customer_with_address
description: Customer joined with address - testing string-heavy join result
query: select c.c_customer_id, c.c_salutation, c.c_first_name, c.c_last_name, c.c_preferred_cust_flag, c.c_birth_country, c.c_login, c.c_email_address, c.c_last_review_date_sk, ca.ca_street_number, ca.ca_street_name, ca.ca_street_type, ca.ca_suite_number, ca.ca_city, ca.ca_county, ca.ca_state, ca.ca_zip, ca.ca_country, ca.ca_location_type from main.tpcds_sf1_delta.customer c join main.tpcds_sf1_delta.customer_address ca on c.c_current_addr_sk = ca.ca_address_sk

name: sales_with_dates
description: Store sales joined with date dimension - 2.8M rows with date/timestamp columns
query: select ss.ss_sold_date_sk, ss.ss_item_sk, ss.ss_customer_sk, ss.ss_quantity, ss.ss_sales_price, d.d_date, d.d_date_id, d.d_month_seq, d.d_week_seq, d.d_quarter_seq, d.d_year, d.d_dow, d.d_moy, d.d_dom, d.d_qoy, d.d_fy_year, d.d_fy_quarter_seq, d.d_fy_week_seq, d.d_day_name, d.d_quarter_name, d.d_holiday, d.d_weekend, d.d_following_holiday, d.d_first_dom, d.d_last_dom, d.d_same_day_ly, d.d_same_day_lq, d.d_current_day, d.d_current_week, d.d_current_month, d.d_current_quarter, d.d_current_year from main.tpcds_sf1_delta.store_sales ss join main.tpcds_sf1_delta.date_dim d on ss.ss_sold_date_sk = d.d_date_sk

name: catalog_sales_filtered
description: Catalog sales filtered by date - ~400K rows

name: store_sales_high_value
description: High value store sales - filtered by amount

name: store_sales_aggregated
query: select ss_sold_date_sk, count(*) as transaction_count, sum(ss_quantity) as total_quantity, sum(ss_sales_price) as total_sales, avg(ss_sales_price) as avg_price, min(ss_sales_price) as min_price, max(ss_sales_price) as max_price from main.tpcds_sf1_delta.store_sales group by ss_sold_date_sk

name: top_items
description: Top selling items with join and aggregation
query: select i.i_item_sk, i.i_item_id, i.i_item_desc, sum(ss.ss_quantity) as total_sold, sum(ss.ss_net_profit) as total_profit from main.tpcds_sf1_delta.store_sales ss join main.tpcds_sf1_delta.item i on ss.ss_item_sk = i.i_item_sk group by i.i_item_sk, i.i_item_id, i.i_item_desc order by total_sold desc limit 1000

name: item
description: Item dimension - 18K rows, 22 columns, small dataset

name: time_dim
description: Time dimension - 86K rows, 10 columns, minimal width

name: store
description: Store dimension - 12 rows, 29 columns (widest, minimal data)
